name: Blocky Soccer Battle Royale
description:
Blocky Soccer Battle Royale is an unique game where you can play BATTLE ROYALE SOCCER matches!

— Third Person Game!
— Footballer Customization!
— Soccer Balls with Real Physics!
— Battle Royale Gamemode!
— Solo Arcade Gamemode!
— The Best Wins Gamemode!
— One vs. One Gamemode!
— Goal Shooting Gamemode!

It's time to kick into action!!
